Directions.1: Preheat the oven to 250 degrees F (120 degrees C). Line a rimmed baking sheet with parchment paper.

Directions.2: Cut sweet potato into 1/4-inch slices crosswise and cut larger slices in half. Place slices on the prepared baking sheet.

Directions.3: Bake in the preheated oven for 1 hour. Turn slices over and bake for 1 1/2 hours more. Turn oven off and leave chews in the oven until completely cooled.
